description: Pakistan pacer Mohammad Amir has issued a stark warning to India's Abhishek Sharma following his three consecutive ducks in the T20 World Cup 2026. Amir drew parallels to Saim Ayub's early struggles, emphasizing how quality bowlers exploit technical flaws.

title: Gold price today: Check rates of 18K, 22K and 24K gold in your city
description: Gold prices saw an upward trend on Thursday, with the April futures contract climbing Rs 365 to Rs 1,56,126 per 10 grams. This rise was fueled by fresh speculator buying and strong spot demand. Globally, New York gold futures also gained, reflecting a positive market sentiment.

title: Rajasthan: Man detained for threatening to 'shoot' Rahul Gandhi & 25 other Congress MPs
description: A man identifying as a Karni Sena spokesperson was detained in Kota for allegedly uploading a video threatening to shoot Rahul Gandhi and 25 other Congress MPs. The threats were issued over alleged verbal abuse of Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla. Both BJP and Karni Sena have denied any association with the accused.

description: India observes the sacred month of Ramazan starting February 19, 2026, with Muslims fasting from dawn till dusk until March 19. This period involves prayer, charity, and community meals, culminating in the Eid-Al-Fitr celebration.  The article provides specific Sehri and Iftar timings for Delhi, Mumbai, and Hyderabad.

Karachi gas explosion: 16 dead, several injured after illegal building collapse
description: A devastating gas explosion ripped through a residential building in Karachi's Soldier Bazaar early this morning, claiming at least 16 lives, including women and children. The blast caused a partial collapse of the ground-plus-two-storey structure, trapping victims under debris. Rescue efforts are underway, with authorities investigating the cause of the tragedy amidst ongoing concerns about building safety in the city.

description: An Indian-origin man, exonerated after 43 years in prison for a murder conviction overturned due to withheld evidence, now faces deportation. Despite his release from state prison, he was immediately taken into federal immigration custody, with bail denied due to a decades-old minor drug felony.

title: ‘Expectations weighing him down’: Gavaskar reveals how Abhishek can survive T20 WC test

He also praised Shivam Dube's explosive batting and highlighted Varun Chakravarthy's crucial role as a key bowler for India.

India topped Group A, while Australia were eliminated. The teams are split into two Super 8 groups, with fixtures across India and Sri Lanka from February 21 to March 1. The top two teams from each group will reach the semi-finals.

This strategic alliance seeks to position India as a global AI hub and empower its youth for the AI era.

Police arrested a wholesale shop owner, Shivakumar, alleging financial distress as the motive for the attack. Investigators believe the suspect sought gold ornaments and cash. CCTV footage and vehicle tracing led to the arrest.

description: Afghanistan's new penal code, signed by the Taliban's supreme leader, permits husbands to physically abuse wives and children without causing severe injury. It formalizes inequality, with different penalties for 'free' individuals and 'slaves.' Psychological and sexual violence against women are not explicitly prohibited, leaving them vulnerable and without adequate legal recourse.

35 students found with wrist cuts in Chhattisgarh govt school; probe ordered
description: Alarm bells rang in Chhattisgarh's Dhamtari district after 35 students from a government middle school were found with healed cut marks on their wrists. The injuries, believed to be weeks old, surfaced after a parent's complaint. Preliminary investigations suggest peer imitation, with students using sharp objects, possibly influenced by a dare or social media trend.

title: How AI uncovered Rs 70,000 crore tax evasion scam starting with Hyderabad biryani chains
description: An Income Tax investigation into Hyderabad biryani chains uncovered a massive tax evasion scam across India's food and beverage industry. Analyzing 60 terabytes of data from a pan-India billing software, officials revealed suppressed sales turnover of at least Rs 70,000 crore since 2019-20. The probe identified deletion and under-reporting of cash transactions as key evasion tactics.

title: Cardi B refuses Stefon Diggs’ attempts to reconnect after breakup
description: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B reportedly had a pretty dramatic break up as the New England Patriots' star player lost miserably at Super Bowl LX. As Cardi B seems to be busy touring the country, a new claim has been made about Stefon Diggs trying his best to win her back. But Cardi B has reacted pretty strongly to it.

title: Rajpal Yadav opens up about playing 500 roles and his strict no-abuse rule on screen
description: Actor Rajpal Yadav, known for his comic roles and honest reflections, discussed his career evolution and principles in a past interview. He emphasized his commitment to clean humor, shunning abusive language despite industry trends. Currently facing legal issues from a cheque bounce case, Yadav's past statements highlight his resilience and dedication to his craft.
